body: Hi Abraham, Thanks a lot for your help. But it still has some problems in my computer: 1. I find some previous discussions about this error "truncated octree", but it seems to be not suitable for my case. 2. There is still a problem after adding the intersectMass component.  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/tUpf1dE*xKaNmufY4F9G63Pgxo3o*PkgMnV5LAnhHXK9XTKtsL6TVC6lE8QwpoBM8OZfKOEBUJvJaREkEDSYQsXJWHyEauOI/5.JPG) Thanks.
